title: RAD Error
body: My patcher starts 33%, but then it goes to to 0 KBps, and will suddenly have the unspecified error. I need help solving the error, so my patcher could continue.

replies.body: During the period that you are receiving the error, the patcher is attempting to establish a connection with our servers to download files.  It seems that there could be a connection issue preventing these files from being received, and giving you the unspecified error.  My recommendation here would be to go through the steps provided in our [Troubleshooting Connection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to resolve this.
Thanks for giving me the site. I hope this helps! :)
